mapper.select:
SELECT hp.id, hp.category_model_format_code, hp.unique_code
FROM tbl_erp_hardware_product AS hp LEFT JOIN tbl_erp_hardware_transport_relation AS htr ON hp.id = htr.hardware_product_id WHERE htr.transport_code_id = #{transportCodeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND hp.invalid = #{invalid,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND htr.invalid = #{invalid,jdbcType=TINYINT};
